object.name: ring yellow green
object.description: A ring, with yellow and green ornamentation. It looks very old.

extra_description.description: It feels heavy.

object.name: corpse
object.description: A halfway decayed corpse of a cartographer.

extra_description.description:
Ew.  This must have been the mapper that was lost in Moria.  His rotted hand
                     |still clutches a partially digested map...

object.name: coins
object.description: A small pile of coins.

object.name: dagger rusty
object.description: A worn and rusty dagger is here.

extra_description.description: It's old and rusted, but it still has a good edge.

object.name: bullwhip whip
object.description: A coiled length of leather is here...looks like a nasty whip!

object.name: club tree huge
object.description: An uprooted tree leans against the wall.

extra_description.description:
This is the biggest club you have ever seen!  The giant didn't even bother to
                     |trim the roots off the end.

object.name: furs smelly
object.description: A heap of smelly furs sit here.

extra_description.description:
They're heavy and smelly and would probably slow you down...but they do look
                     |like good armor.

object.name: potion purple
object.description: A purple potion is here.

extra_description.description: It looks rather strange!

object.name: helmet metal
object.description: A metal helmet is here.

object.name: mushroom
object.description: A small mushroom is here.

extra_description.description: Let's put it this way - I wouldn't eat it !

object.name: dirk
object.description: A beautifully crafted dirk is lying here.

extra_description.description:
It's a medium sized, beautifully crafted dirk made from grey alloy.
                     |Its blade is double-edged and very thin ... this looks like a good
                     |thieves weapon.

object.name: axe war
object.description: A razor-sharp war axe rests on the ground.

extra_description.description: It has an edge sharp enough to cut a passing thought. A good find, this.

object.name: sword broad
object.description: A well-polished broadsword sits here.

extra_description.description: It's much heavier than a long sword, but not as well balanced.

object.name: flail two two-headed
object.description: A flail with two heavy, spiked heads is here.

extra_description.description:
It's a stout wooden rod with two spiked balls attached, each weighing over 2
                     |pounds.  It's a little worn for wear, but looks most painful.

object.name: mace heavy
object.description: A large iron mace with a wicked head rests on the ground.

extra_description.description: A metal shaft mounted with an iron head, shaped into armor-shattering form.

object.name: falchion sword
object.description: A curved sword with a heavy tip sits here.

extra_description.description:
It's curved like a scimitar, only with no recurved blade and a tip designed
                     |for piercing as well as slashing.

object.name: voulge polearm
object.description: A long polearm with a curved blade is here.

extra_description.description:
It looks a lot like a staff with a pruning knife tied to the end, but it's
                     |quite effective.

object.name: blade black demon
object.description: An evil black demon blade is here.

extra_description.description: You'll become as evil as the weapon, if you use it!

object.name: gloves
object.description: Some gloves are here.  They look like the right equipment for fighting.

object.name: scroll ysafg
object.description: A scroll which reads "ysafg", it looks very fragile and quite old.

extra_description.description: It looks informative.

object.name: slime mold
object.description: A green slime mold is here. It smells REAL bad.

extra_description.description: It wasn't meant to be food, - Certainly not for humans.

object.name: slime mold
object.description: A green slime mold is here. It smells REAL bad.

extra_description.description: It wasn't meant to be food, - Certainly not for humans.

object.name: staff iron iron-shod
object.description: A long staff capped with iron leans against a wall.

extra_description.description: It's a superb weapon for warrior or mage.

object.name: black potion
object.description: A thick black potion is here.

extra_description.description: It looks healthy.

object.name: staff oak
object.description: A ancient heavy oak staff is here.

extra_description.description: The runes says : Funthark.
You see it has some sort of runes on it.

object.name: dagger light silver
object.description: A light silver dagger is here.

extra_description.description: It looks like an excellent weapon for thieves.

object.name: star morning morningstar
object.description: A heavy, spiked morning star is here.

extra_description.description:
It's a huge length of wood studded with iron spikes and bands. You wouldn't
                     |want to meet this in a dark alley...

object.name: map moria second
object.short_descr: a map of the second level of Moria
object.description: A rolled up map is here.

extra_description.description:
.
                     |    * * * MORIA - Map 2 * * *
                     |     = = =============== = =
                     |
                     |Maze--Maze
                     | |     |    (Map 1)
                     | |    Maze--Tunnel*
                     | |
                     |Maze--Maze--Maze--Maze
                     |              |
                     |     Large--Large
                     |     Cave   Cave
                     |      |       |
                     |     Large--Large--Tunnel--End of
                     |     Cave    Cave    |     Tunnel
                     |                   *Hole
                     |                  (Map 3)

object.name: map moria third
object.short_descr: a map of the third level of Moria
object.description: A rolled up map is here.

extra_description.description:
.
                     |                                                   (Map 1*)
                     |                             Long                     |
                     |        Tunnel----Tunnel----Tunnel--Tunnel--Tunnel--Tunnel
                     |          |                   |
                     |          |                  Gold--Gold
                     |          |                  Cave  Cave
                     |          |                   |      |
                     |          |                  Gold--Gold---Passage
                     |          |                  Cave  Cave      |
                     |          |                   |           Passage--Tunnel--Tunnel--Tunnel
                     |          |          Dark*---Gold            |
                     |          |         Passage  Cave            |     Secret
                     |          |                               Passage  Chamber
                     |          |                      Hole        |       |
                     |          |                        |      Passage  Secret
                     |        Large   Large   Large    Small       |     Chamber--Cave--Cave
                     |        Tunnel--Tunnel--Tunnel--Passage      |                |      |
                     |          |                        |      Passage-----------Cave--Cave
                     |          |                       Long
                     |          |                      Tunnel
                     |         Wet    Small  Small       |
                     |        Tunnel--Maze---Maze   Inscription
                     |          |       |      |         |
                     |         Wet    Small--Small-----Small
                     |        Tunnel  Maze   Maze      Maze
                     |          |       |                |
                     |          |      Wet    Wet      End of
                     |        Water    Maze---Maze-----Tunnel
                     |          |       |      |
                     |        Water---Water  End of
                     |                       Maze*
                     |                      (Map 2)
